name: Sparks Disaster
description:
As  part of my graded unit for HND Ayrshire College Games Development, I had to make a game with 1 3D element.  I focused far more on just having a functional game that was easy to follow and having a working prototype and not the models or fine tuning any mechanics, so apologies for the default mannequin models, and for the janky mechanics etc.  The level art was made by SilverTM, I got this through the Unreal Marketplace, although I do have some plans to change it about a little bit in future iterations.  Hope you have some fun playing this.  

I  will probably revisit this project at some point in the future.  It is currently lacking in optimisations,  sounds, models and length.
